entry.title: OrthoBS keyboard review (IBM capacitive buckling springs)

media:group.media:title: OrthoBS keyboard review (IBM capacitive buckling springs)
media:group.media:description:
Skip to 10:01 for a typing demonstration. Today we look at some chimaeric abomination that was sent to me over three years ago. Capacitive buckling springs.... but at what cost? Hope you enjoy the video :) .
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne
My keyboard reviews: http://bit.ly/1TbOtft My switch teardowns: http://bit.ly/2C1QGHz My TOP X videos: http://bit.ly/2FmpZfd My XL typing demos: https://bit.ly/2OoAW3w My tutorials and featurettes: https://bit.ly/2OrkLUh My unboxing videos: https://bit.ly/2TSrr0m
I'm Thomas and I do videos and reviews on mechanical keyboards ranging from the most sickening modern RGB gaming keyboards to vintage hardware relics, or sometimes keycaps or keyswitches ranging from Cherry MX to Alps SKCM to IBM buckling springs and anything in between.
Follow me on Twitter for updates on my keyboard videos! https://twitter.com/chyrosran22

media:group.media:title: Unboxing a Lofree "1%" transparent keyboard!
media:group.media:description:
Today we're looking at, let's be honest, a total misnomer :p . This is not a 1% keyboard, but instead, a mostly transparent one. Hope you enjoy the video! Get them here: Lofree 1%: https://bit.ly/3Tu1LF1 Lofree 1% Orange Soda: https://bit.ly/3Vg5DuN 10% discount code: Thomas Note: I don't make any money at all off of any sales, my videos are entirely non-profit. They simply asked me to include this in the description.
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne

media:group.media:title: Teardown - new Ellipse beamspring switches!
media:group.media:description:
Today we look at an awesome development; a new beamspring switch heavily inspired by IBM's original design. These come from Joe over at modelfkeyboards.com and are the type that feature in the first round of beamspring keyboards.
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne

entry.title: New Tai-Hao Cubic Alps-mount keycaps review

media:group.media:title: New Tai-Hao Cubic Alps-mount keycaps review
media:group.media:description:
Erratum; this set is actually NOT fully compatible with the AEK, which uses rotated switches and extended key posts for the F keys. Thanks to poip032 for reminding me! Get them here: https://shop.tai-hao.com/categories/alps-keycaps Man, this turned out to be WAY more work than I thought it would be xD . Today we look at one of Tai-Hao's new Alps-mount keycap sets! Choices for Alps keycaps are quite limited, so these new (and expanded) sets are a very interesting new arrival! Hope you enjoy the video!
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne
My keyboard reviews: http://bit.ly/1TbOtft My switch teardowns: http://bit.ly/2C1QGHz My TOP X videos: http://bit.ly/2FmpZfd My XL typing demos: https://bit.ly/2OoAW3w My tutorials and featurettes: https://bit.ly/2OrkLUh My unboxing videos: https://bit.ly/2TSrr0m

media:group.media:description:
Skip to 9:25 for a typing demonstration. Today we look at a new offering from Wooting, which incorporates a bunch of changes compared to their older line-up. Hope you enjoy the video! :)

media:group.media:title: Unboxing an MM Studio Class80 keyboard!
media:group.media:description:

media:group.media:description:

media:group.media:title: Unboxing a Wooting 60 HE keyboard!
media:group.media:description: Get it here: https://wooting.io/ Today we're looking at a new offering from Wooting! And it comes with one of the weirdest features I've ever seen in a keyboard xD . Hope you enjoy the video!

media:group.media:title: Unboxing a Vissles V84 keyboard!
media:group.media:description:
Get it here: https://vissles.com/products/v84-wireless-mechanical-keyboard-hot-swappable
Another Vissles to unbox! This time something very different, and unfortunately not quite as interesting. As it turns out it's mainly just a 75% hotswap with MX clones.... although it does have some features on it. Maybe I will end up reviewing this, maybe not. Another unboxing coming soon! :D
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne

media:group.media:title: Weytec Smart Touch keyboard review
media:group.media:description:
Skijp to 11:08 for a typing demonstration. Today we get to take a look at Weytec's Smart Touch keyboard, a highly interactive multifunctional that can control multiple workstations at once across an integrated platform. Loaded, as per usual with Weytec, with functions and options, this is not an easy type of board to review, but I hope you enjoy the video anyway :D .
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Vissles LP85 keyboard review (optoelectric scissor switches)

media:group.media:title: Vissles LP85 keyboard review (optoelectric scissor switches)
media:group.media:description:
Skip to 9:28 for a typing demonstration. Get it here: https://vissles.com/collections/keyboard When I accepted this keyboard for review I didn't think I'd have quite as much fun filming it as I did, nor how sarcastic it'd make me xD . Still, an interesting project! Hope you enjoy the video! :)
(Sorry for the occasional crackling in the audio. There seems to be some problem with the microphone and I'm not sure what's causing it.)
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne

entry.title: Keydous NJ80 keyboard review (Gateron Pro Yellow)

media:group.media:title: Keydous NJ80 keyboard review (Gateron Pro Yellow)
media:group.media:description:
Skip to 11:45 for a typing demonstration. Today we look at a mid-budgete hotswap chassis, the Keydous NJ80, as well as Gateron Pro switches, their updated line of MX clone switches. Hope you enjoy the video!
Intro by Kyle Carter Outro by Facundo Cabanne
